scripts.ef:add: dotnet ef migrations add %npm_config_name% --project Stark.BL --startup-project LINQ.Playground
scripts.ef:update: dotnet ef database update --project Stark.BL --startup-project LINQ.Playground
scripts.ef:list: dotnet ef migrations list --project Stark.BL --startup-project LINQ.Playground
scripts.ef:remove: dotnet ef migrations remove --project Stark.BL --startup-project LINQ.Playground
scripts.ef:drop: dotnet ef database drop --force --project Stark.BL --startup-project LINQ.Playground
scripts.ef:script: dotnet ef migrations script --project Stark.BL --startup-project LINQ.Playground
